name: Don't Think About It
description:
Something is stirring inside the O'Cork family manner. Help Gaël solve this mystery. Will you have to push him to the depths of insanity?

This game was made during InkJam2021

____________________________________________________________________________________

Quelquechose est arrivé dans le manoir de la famille O'Cork. Aide Gaël à résoudre ce mystère. Faut-il le pousser dans les retranchements de sa folie ?

Ce jeu a été créé lors de la InkJam2021
____________________________________________________________________________________

Tutorial :

Use green nodes to move around. Objects can be interacted with by clicking on them if they're outlined on mouse hover. Hold right click to move the camera around.

 Certain dialogue option will unlock when the right conditions are met such as carrying an item in your inventory or having noticed a specific event. Feel free to check items again if you are stuck.

____________________________________________________________________________________
